Package org.mundo.rt

Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of MundoCore applications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AsyncCall.IResultListener Implement this interface to listen for the result of a asynchronous method call.
DoObject.IConn Implement this interface to keep track of the connection state of an object.
IActivate The methods provided by this interface are used to transform an object tree from an active into a passive representation and vice versa.
IBCLProvider The Basic Communication Layer (BCL) is the most basic communication component.
IBCLProvider.ISignal The signal interface of the BCL.
ICopy The methods provided by this interface are used to create a deep copy of an object.
IEmits Each class that emits signals must implement this interface.
IMessageHandler Protocol handlers implement this interface.
IProtocolCondition Protocol conditions implement this interface.
IReceiver Classes that want to receive messages have to implement the IReceiver interface.
IRMCService Services providing Remote Method Calls implement this interface.
Logger.IHandler Implement this interface to receive log data.
Service.IProp Implement this interface to keep track of property changes.
 

Class Summary
ActiveArray TypedArray is a list class that provides access methods for boxing/unboxing of base types.
ActiveMap An ActiveMap holds an object tree in an active form.
AsyncCall AsyncCall objects are returned by stub methods that perform asynchronous remote method calls.
BCLProvider The Basic Communication Layer (BCL) is the most basic communication component.
Blob A Blob implements a dynamic buffer for binary data.
Channel A channel is the object a client uses to specify the target of messages it produces and the source of messages it consumes.
ClassWrapper Generic wrapper forwarding requests to internal serializiers.
DefaultConfig  
DoObject DoObject is the abstract base class from which all client-side stubs are derived.
DoObject.Options Options can be specified as last parameter when doing a remote method call.
Facet  
GUID Instances of GUID encapsulate 128-bit unique identifiers.
IntegerMonitor An utility class for synchronization.
LogEntry Encapsulates log entries.
Logger Provides a portable logging API.
Message A message consists of a number of chunks.
Message.Chunk This class encapsulates a chunk of the message.
MessageContext MessageContext objects provide additional information about how a Message has been published.
Metaclass Abstract base class for the automatically generated MundoCore metaclasses.
Mundo The Mundo class provides some basic functions, that every application requires.
Mutex Extended mutual exclusion class with deadlock detection.
ObjectAdapter An object adapter is the glue between subscribers and target objects.
ProtocolStack Encapsulates a custom protocol stack.
ProtocolStack.BranchHandler A protocol handler for branching in protocol stacks.
ProtocolStack.Handler This class encapsulates information about a message handler.
Publisher The Publisher class represents an advertisement and is used to send messages to a specific channel.
Queue<E> Implements a first-in-first-out queue.
RootService  
Semaphore Extended semaphore class with deadlock detection.
ServerStub ServerStub is the abstract base class from which all server-side stubs are derived.
Service A service is a not-too-small component of an application that performs some functionality by processing messages received from channels or by being invoked via remote method calls (RMC).
Session Sessions manage publishers, subscribers and exported objects.
Signal This utility class offers various methods to connect message sources to message consumers.
Subscriber Instances of Subscriber encapsulate subscriptions.
SubscriptionParameters SubscriptionParameters is an abstract base class.
Tracer Debugging helper class to detect where programs get stuck.
TypedArray TypedArray is a list class that provides access methods for boxing/unboxing of base types.
TypedContainer Abstract base class for container classes.
TypedContainer.JavaXDR The JavaXDR class wraps data in Java's external data representation that was generated by the standard serialization mechanism.
TypedContainer.UnsignedByte The UnsignedByte class wraps a value of primitive type unsigned byte in an object.
TypedContainer.UnsignedInteger The UnsignedInteger class wraps a value of primitive type unsigned int in an object.
TypedContainer.UnsignedLong The UnsignedLong class wraps a value of primitive type unsigned long in an object.
TypedContainer.UnsignedShort The UnsignedShort class wraps a value of primitive type unsigned short in an object.
TypedMap A TypedMap holds an object tree either in an active or passive form and has operations to transform from one form to the other.
 

Exception Summary
RMCException Thrown when an error during a remote method call occurs.
SignalMismatchException Thrown when unmatching signals and slots are connected.
UnsupportedOperationException Thrown when the requested method is not implemented.
 

Package org.mundo.rt Description

Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of MundoCore applications.
